201301.n: Basic Concepts and Teaching of Science

catList: Basic ideas of classical physics: motion, stability and linear systems-oscillations, gravitation, electromagnetism, thermodynamics. Basic quantum concepts: Bohr model of the hydrogen atom, uncertainty principle and its consequences for the structure of matter and applications in technology, Pauli principle and atomic structure. Mathematical level of NS 101: elementary calculus differentiation and integration, the exponential and trigonometric functions, through examples in science.
